alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Neshoba; Noxubee; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:02PM CDT until June 14 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Northwestern Kemper County in east central Mississippi... Southern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northeastern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 302 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stallo, or 11 miles southwest of Louisville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Noxapater and Stallo around 310 PM CDT. Nanih Waiya around 325 PM CDT. Preston around 335 PM CDT. Gholson around 340 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
